document_data.name: Mulltown
document_data.mainbody: '''Mulltown''' was a small village in [[Impiltur]] which was popular among travelers. It was the first Impilturian stop along the [[Merchant's Run]] headed south from [[Damara]].
document_data.Description: Situated just east of the [[Rawlinswood]], Mulltown was ideally located to provide commercial support for the larger city-states of Impiltur.
document_data.Defenses: The village was well-defended to provide security for overnight visitors and traveling merchants. Soldiers from [[Ilmwatch]] would regularly patrol the days-long route from the [[Easting Reach]] to Mulltown in order to keep it and the other towns along Merchant's Run safe.
document_data.Inhabitants: Fine inns and skilled smithies were common features in the village, helping to cater to the many travelers who passed through.
